bio.Recent_Position: Financial Planning & Analysis Intern at NationalGrid
bio.Involvements: ASUCI Media & Technology Commission, Product Association Fellowship
bio.Bios: Hiii!! My name is Megha and I initiated in the fall of my freshman year with the Alpha Iota class. In my free time, I enjoy reading, painting, going to coffee shops, and film photography. A fun fact is that my dream job was to become a fashion designer when I was younger. Ask me about my movie recommendations or travel bucket list at recruitment-- I look forward to meeting you!
